author: ralexstokes
content:
this change would _greatly_ simplify the builder APIs and along w/ the gossip security improvements means this change is a strict improvement (and so should be included in the specs)

here's a rough sketch of what builder API changes we would need:

```
getHeader:
signed_builder_bid:
- header -> header with blob commitments
- drop blinded blobs bundle

I think its fine for the relay to handle KZG inclusion proof computation, proposer doesn't need to also do it

getPayload:
- only post SignedBlindedBeaconBlock
- drop blinded sidecars

Relay maybe shares KZG inclusion proof with proposer here, but doesnâ€™t have to
```

i think we should discuss on the testing call monday and assuming there isn't any opposition i should be able to make the updates to the builder APIs later that day

author: jgm
content: When you say getHeader is proposed to return "header with blob commitments" can you confirm that the call would return an execution payload header (as it does today) plus a separate list of blob commitments?  So in fact very similar to what is returned today, except that the blobs bundle is replace by a simple list of blob commitments?
